name: Agentify Skills
description: Production-ready Claude Code skills extracted from Agentify. Patterns for Rails authentication, multi-tenant SaaS, LLM integration, MCP servers, and Slack/ChatKit channels.

categories.name: Authentication & Authorization
categories.description: Identity management, sessions, OAuth, and password recovery

categories.name: Multi-Tenant Architecture
categories.description: SaaS patterns for account-based data isolation

categories.name: AI Infrastructure
categories.description: LLM clients, MCP protocol, and agent building blocks

categories.name: UI Widgets
categories.description: Chat interfaces and visual components for AI responses

categories.name: Slack Integration
categories.description: Slack as a channel for AI agents with Block Kit, MCP, and work objects

categories.name: Testing Infrastructure
categories.description: Test helpers and patterns for Rails applications

categories.name: Meta Skills
categories.description: Skills for creating and managing other skills

skills.name: Rails 8 Authentication
skills.description: Implement Rails 8 built-in authentication with has_secure_password, session cookies, and the Authentication concern. Use when building login/logout functionality, session-based auth, or user authentication systems in Rails 8+ applications.

skills.name: OAuth 2.1 Provider
skills.description: Implement an RFC-compliant OAuth 2.1 authorization server in Rails applications. Use when building apps that need to authorize third-party clients (like MCP clients, API consumers, or external integrations) using industry-standard OAuth flows with PKCE, dynamic client registration, and token management.

skills.name: Password Reset Flow
skills.description: Implement secure password reset with Rails 8's built-in token generation. Use when building 'forgot password' functionality with email verification and time-limited reset tokens.

skills.name: Session Management
skills.description: Implement database-backed session management with cookie handling, audit trails, and multiple device support. Use when building authentication systems that need session tracking, device management, or security audit capabilities.

skills.name: Multi-Tenant Accounts
skills.description: Implement multi-tenant architecture using an Account model as the tenant boundary. Use when building SaaS applications, team-based apps, or any system where data must be isolated between organizations/accounts.

skills.name: User Management
skills.description: Implement user CRUD operations within an account with permission controls and feature flags. Use when building team member management, user administration, or account user settings in multi-tenant Rails applications.

skills.name: LLM Gateway
skills.description: Build a multi-provider LLM client abstraction layer for Rails applications. Use when integrating multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Ollama), implementing provider switching, feature-based model routing, or standardizing LLM responses across providers.

skills.name: MCP Rails
skills.description: Implement Model Context Protocol (MCP) in Rails applications. Use when building AI agents that need to connect to MCP servers, expose Rails apps as MCP servers, or manage MCP subprocess containers via Docker. Covers JSON-RPC transport, OAuth 2.1 PKCE authentication, SSE streaming, and multi-worker process coordination.

skills.name: ChatKit Frontend Bootstrap
skills.description: Embed and initialize OpenAI's ChatKit widget in Rails views. Use when adding ChatKit to a page, configuring the openai-chatkit custom element via data attributes, syncing themes with dark/light mode, handling Turbo navigation, or setting up attachment uploads.

skills.name: ChatKit Rails Backend
skills.description: Integrate OpenAI ChatKit with a Rails backend using SSE streaming. Use when building conversational AI with thread management, message streaming, widget rendering from MCP tool results, file attachments, and human-in-the-loop form interactions.

skills.name: MCP Widget Authoring
skills.description: Create ChatKit UI widgets in MCP servers. Use when building visual components that render in ChatKit from tool results. Covers widget templates with JSON Schema validation, WidgetTemplateService for hydration, BaseMCPServer patterns, and multi-channel support for Slack.

skills.name: Slack Channel Integration
skills.description: Build Slack as a communication channel for AI agents. Use when implementing Slack OAuth, webhooks, event processing, or creating agent-to-Slack messaging pipelines.

skills.name: Slack Block Kit UI
skills.description: Render rich Block Kit messages in Slack from AI agent tool results. Use when building agents that display formatted responses with sections, images, and buttons.

skills.name: Slack MCP Server
skills.description: Create MCP servers that interact with Slack APIs. Use when building agent tools for Slack canvases, posting messages, or other Slack operations via Model Context Protocol.

skills.name: Slack Work Objects
skills.description: Create trackable Work Objects in Slack with link unfurling and flexpane details. Use when building agents that need persistent, interactive entities.

skills.name: Test Auth Helpers
skills.description: Implement authentication testing patterns with RSpec, FactoryBot, and test helpers for Rails applications. Use when writing controller specs, system tests, or request specs that require authenticated users and multi-tenant account context.

skills.name: Code Pattern Extraction
skills.description: Extract reusable design and implementation patterns from codebases into Skills. Use when asked to analyze code for patterns, document architectural decisions, create transferrable implementation guides, or extract knowledge into Skills.
